enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.25), SBSTA considers the use of information on P&Ms used by Annex I Parties that address, inter alia, the use of information from international and intergovernmental organizations such as the Organization of Oil Producing Countries (OPEC) and the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).
The final paragraph, which requests information on Annex I P&Ms from international and intergovernmental organizations, including OPEC and UNCTAD, remains bracketed.
